template.name: IBM AS400 Agent Emulator
template.description: Template for using with our own "agents"

item.name: Size of output queue $1 in library $2
Size of output queue $1 in library $2
Size of output queue $1 in library $2

trigger_prototype.expression: {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:as400.disk.size[{#DSK_SN},pused].min(#2)}>{$MAX_DISK_PUSED} and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:as400.disk.state[{#DSK_SN}].count(#2,1)}=0 and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:as400.disk.state[{#DSK_SN}].count(#2,2)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {#DSK_NAME} used more than {$MAX_DISK_PUSED}%

trigger_prototype.expression: {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused].min(#2)}>{$MAX_DISK_PUSED:"{#FSNAME}"} and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:vfs.fs.state[{#FSNAME}].count(#2,1)}=0 and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:vfs.fs.state[{#FSNAME}].count(#2,2)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: ASP{#FSNAME} used more than {$MAX_DISK_PUSED:"{#FSNAME}"}%

trigger.name: New critical message in AS400 message queue

trigger.expression: {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].nodata(7)}<>1 and ({IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].regexp("^CPPEA33 ")}=1 or ({IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].logsource("^#OVERRIDE")}=0 and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].regexp("^(CPI2401|CPA5201|BRM1472|BRM1392|CPA7025|CPI096E|CPI5906|CPPEA33|CPF8198|CPF9E7E|CPF9E7D) ")}=0) )
trigger.name: New error message in AS400 message queue

trigger.expression: {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].nodata(7)}<>1 and ({IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].regexp("^BRM1392 ")}=1 or {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].logsource(QCLNSYSLOG)}=0 and {IBM AS400 Agent Emulator:eventlog[QSYSOPR,,70,,,100,skip].regexp("^CPA7025 ")}=1)
trigger.name: New warning message in AS400 message queue
Output queue QEZDEBUG has a lot of spool files
Output queue QEZDEBUG is growing too fast
Output queue QEZJOBLOG has a lot of spool files
Output queue QEZJOBLOG is growing too fast
Output queue QPRINT has a lot of spool files
There are jobs in state LCKW
Zabbix agent (active mode) on {HOST.NAME} is unreachable

mapping.newvalue: no status
varyoff
varyon
active
available
There is no unit control value
The disk unit is active
The disk unit has failed
Some other disk unit in the disk subsystem has failed
Hardware failure (affects performance, but not the function)
Hardware failure (does not affect the function or performance)
The disk unit's parity protection is being rebuilt
The disk unit is not ready
The disk unit is write protected
The disk unit is busy
The disk unit is not operational
The disk unit has returned a status that is not recognizable
The disk unit cannot be accessed
The disk unit is read/write protected
Not configured or not attached
